report.title: Helped Me
report.author: Frankomatic
report.bodytext: The purpose of these NICOTINE FREE cigarettes is not to get me high. Quite the opposite. It helped me to quit smoking when the habit was still dominating my brain, while I waited for the drug to purge from my system. /n /n After the first week or so, I no longer craved nicotine, the Extasy cigarettes just smelled bad, so I put them down and that was the end of it.
